title: From the yellow jersey to the lanterne rouge: the ambitions of every team in the Tour de France
content:
Winning a stage, hitting the podium, or claiming the 'maillot jaune' are at an absolute premier every July: Here are the leaders for every team and their chances of striking Tour gold.

Read the full article at From the yellow jersey to the lanterne rouge: the ambitions of every team in the Tour de France on Velo.
author: ahood
